bibl.title: Two Hoards of Ptolemaic Silver: IGCH 1713 and 1722.
bibl.note: I. The Sharn没b Hoard [IGCH 1713] and the Crisis of 89/8 BC. 56 tetradrachms found in 1964 near the town of Sharn没b in the Egyptian delta. - II. IGCH 1722 and the Great Debasement of 53/2 BC. 169 tetradrachms, presumably from Egypt, offered for sale in Toronto in 1967.
bibl.seg: HAZZARD Richard A., Two Hoards of Ptolemaic Silver: IGCH 1713 and 1722.

I. The Sharn没b Hoard [IGCH 1713] and the Crisis of 89/8 BC. 56 tetradrachms found in 1964 near the town of Sharn没b in the Egyptian delta. - II. IGCH 1722 and the Great Debasement of 53/2 BC. 169 tetradrachms, presumably from Egypt, offered for sale in Toronto in 1967.
